phrases: He became a prince out of necessity.
He realized that if nothing else, the future we hoped for
would never come unless someone became the sacrificial lamb called a prince.
So even though it was not what he wanted, he decided to be a prince.
In this world with no king...
But exactly how did he become a prince?
I still do not know that secret.
This is the center of the world?
Episode 1 : I Picked Up a Prince
It is different than I imagined, somehow.
And the fountain is way further away than I thought...
I wonder if everyone is mad at me.
If I had my phone on, Osugi would definitely be calling me.
Well, I have come this far, so I have to do what I am here for!
Young lady, what did you just throw?
More like, why is he naked?
No. 9 is even more unique than I would imagined.
Prepare for my return to Japan.
I pray you shall continue to be a savior.
For that matter, I am naked...
A cell phone and... a gun?!
I remember the White House, but I do not know who I am.
Young lady, what did you just throw?
Actually, I think I am the one in trouble.
You were almost in real trouble there.
You should get away while you have got the chance.
But you know it is bad to throw things at the White House.
Er, I will lend you this.
I need to get away, too.
It is my thanks for helping me.
Do not mind if I do, then.
Is not there some record that will help me figure out who I am?
I thought you were just going to fade out.
It sounds like you are all right.
Do you know who I am?
This is the first time you have erased your memories,
and I received no order to prepare a new background for you,
so I really could not say who you might be right now.
My last order was to tell you where to go next, so I am sending that to you.
Well then, I wish for your success
and sincerely pray you shall continue to be a savior.
So is this where I live, then?
I was so scared... what was that about?
I guess people really should not do unfamiliar things.
It is in my coat pocket!
Well, considering how I am dressed...
I have to get it back!
Wh-Why would that guy give him his pants?!
No way, where did he go?
Dude, what do you think you are doing?
Say, my apartment's on the second floor, right?
Are not you in Room B on the third floor?
If I do not hurry, I will miss my flight!
Hey, we got a suspicious male and female couple on the loose.
I am sending the pic from the security camera.
I do not remember this at all.
What is this, a terrorist hideout?!
It is like that movie- what was it called again?
No, then I would not be naked, I would have a Mohawk.
What, instead of De Niro, I am Jason Bourne?
Someone is definitely setting me up.
Am I a terrorist after all?!
YOU-Um, you are the person I loaned my coat to, right?
Would you mind giving it back?
You see, my passport and wallet are in the pockets.
I will give you the coat itself, so please just give those back!
Okay, from now on I am Akira Takizawa!
What is he doing in there?
I need to ask you something.
The girl in this picture- is that you?
I need to see your johnny.
It sure does look like me, but where was that taken?
I guess it is me, huh?
I was pretty cold back there, after all.
If we are unlucky, this whole place could burn down.
When are you going back to Japan?
Let us go home together, then.
I left my bag behind on my way here.
You mean back at the White House?
Then it is too bad, but you should not go back there.
Will you loan me enough for cab fare?
Take us to the police station, quick as you can.
So this passport's not fake, anyway...
Here you go, ticket and passport.
To think the embassy even booked us a flight...
worrying about what did happen if they found out we lied...
We did not lie about anything.
And we properly reported the theft to the police.
Otherwise, the embassy would not have lent us plane fare.
Government officials are more cold-hearted than you would think.
Um, it feels like you have ended up helping me with a lot of things,
but can I ask you about one thing that is been bugging me?
What were you really doing there when I first met you?
The truth is, I am a terrorist.
See, that is a popular game among the exchange students over here.
Pretty awful how they make us carry guns, huh?
That is a very extreme game.
What are you doing in D.C.?
Oh, I was on a college graduation trip.
It was a trip to New York, but I really wanted to see the White House,
I thought maybe it was the center of the world.
I do not usually pay much attention to the YOU.S.,
but I started thinking maybe everything from my little problems
to the whole world situation was connected to this place at the root.
And there is something going on in Japan, you know?
A heavy atmosphere that we cannot do anything about ourselves anymore.
So I thought I would wish for them to help us out, even a little.
I would actually thought better of it even before you came.
I realized this place has nothing to do with us.
I get you... not that I understand.
But a certain someone is little terrorist act landed a blow for me,
You were born on January 7th, 1 989- you are the same as me!
Born during the last week of the Showa era, right before it became Heisei!
Huh, so you are in the Showa 64 gang too...
But since you were born on the seventh, I am a day older.
That heavy atmosphere you were talking about... is it this?
If we mix in some bewilderment, it will end
If we are in danger of wavering, let us just abandon our reasons
I can still forgive you, I can still know the meaning
The night exists to be listened to closely
I can copy that reason, and change
I would not mind cutting off the future to know your breath
I would not mind cutting off the future
